data.name: Attack Order
data.desc: The user calls out its underlings to pummel the target. Critical hits land more easily.

data.name: Bug Bite
data.desc: The user bites the target. If the target is holding a Berry, the user eats it and gains its effect.

data.name: Bug Buzz
data.desc: The user generates a damaging sound wave by vibration. This may also lower the target's Sp. Def stat.

data.name: Defend Order
data.desc: The user calls out its underlings to shield its body, raising its Defense and Sp. Def stats.

data.name: Fell Stinger
data.desc: When the user knocks out a target with this move, the user's Attack stat rises drastically.

data.name: First Impression
data.desc: Although this move has great power, it only works the first turn the user is in battle.

data.name: Fury Cutter
data.desc: The target is slashed with scythes or claws. This attack becomes more powerful if it hits in succession.

data.name: Heal Order
data.desc: The user calls out its underlings to heal it. The user regains up to half of its max HP.

data.name: Infestation
data.desc: The target is infested and attacked for four to five turns. The target can't flee during this time.

data.name: Leech Life
data.desc: The user drains the target's blood. The user's HP is restored by half the damage taken by the target.

data.name: Lunge
data.desc: The user makes a lunge at the target, attacking with full force. This also lowers the target's Attack stat.

data.name: Megahorn
data.desc: Using its tough and impressive horn, the user rams into the target with no letup.

data.name: Pin Missile
data.desc: Sharp spikes are shot at the target in rapid succession. They hit two to five times in a row.

data.name: Pollen Puff
data.desc: The user attacks the enemy with a pollen puff that explodes. If the target is an ally, it gives the ally a pollen puff that restores its HP instead.

data.name: Powder
data.desc: The user covers the target in a combustible powder. If the target uses a Fire-type move, the powder explodes and damages the target.

data.name: Quiver Dance
data.desc: The user lightly performs a beautiful, mystic dance. This boosts the user's Sp. Atk, Sp. Def, and Speed stats.

data.name: Rage Powder
data.desc: The user scatters a cloud of irritating powder to draw attention to itself. Opponents aim only at the user.

data.name: Savage Spin-Out
data.desc: The user binds the target with full force with threads of silk that the user spits using its Z-Power. The power varies, depending on the original move.

data.name: Savage Spin-Out
data.desc: The user binds the target with full force with threads of silk that the user spits using its Z-Power. The power varies, depending on the original move.

data.name: Signal Beam
data.desc: The user attacks with a sinister beam of light. This may also confuse the target.

data.name: Silver Wind
data.desc: The target is attacked with powdery scales blown by the wind. This may also raise all the user's stats.

data.name: Spider Web
data.desc: The user ensnares the target with thin, gooey silk so it can't flee from battle.

data.name: Steamroller
data.desc: The user crushes its target by rolling over the target with its rolled-up body. This may also make the target flinch.

data.name: Sticky Web
data.desc: The user weaves a sticky net around the opposing team, which lowers their Speed stat upon switching into battle.

data.name: String Shot
data.desc: The opposing Pokémon are bound with silk blown from the user's mouth that harshly lowers the Speed stat.

data.name: Struggle Bug
data.desc: While resisting, the user attacks the opposing Pokémon. This lowers the Sp. Atk stat of those hit.

data.name: Tail Glow
data.desc: The user stares at flashing lights to focus its mind, drastically raising its Sp. Atk stat.

data.name: Twineedle
data.desc: The user damages the target twice in succession by jabbing it with two spikes. This may also poison the target.

data.name: U-turn
data.desc: After making its attack, the user rushes back to switch places with a party Pokémon in waiting.

data.name: X-Scissor
data.desc: The user slashes at the target by crossing its scythes or claws as if they were a pair of scissors.

data.name: Assurance
data.desc: If the target has already taken some damage in the same turn, this attack's power is doubled.

data.name: Beat Up
data.desc: The user gets all party Pokémon to attack the target. The more party Pokémon, the greater the number of attacks.

data.name: Bite
data.desc: The target is bitten with viciously sharp fangs. This may also make the target flinch.

data.name: Black Hole Eclipse
data.desc: The user gathers dark energy using its Z-Power and sucks the target into it. The power varies, depending on the original move.

data.name: Black Hole Eclipse
data.desc: The user gathers dark energy using its Z-Power and sucks the target into it. The power varies, depending on the original move.

data.name: Brutal Swing
data.desc: The user swings its body around violently to inflict damage on everything in its vicinity.

data.name: Crunch
data.desc: The user crunches up the target with sharp fangs. This may also lower the target's Defense stat.

data.name: Dark Pulse
data.desc: The user releases a horrible aura imbued with dark thoughts. This may also make the target flinch.

data.name: Dark Void
data.desc: Opposing Pokémon are dragged into a world of total darkness that makes them sleep.

data.name: Darkest Lariat
data.desc: The user swings both arms and hits the target. The target's stat changes don't affect this attack's damage.

data.name: Embargo
data.desc: This move prevents the target from using its held item for five turns. Its Trainer is also prevented from using items on it.

data.name: Fake Tears
data.desc: The user feigns crying to fluster the target, harshly lowering its Sp. Def stat.

data.name: Feint Attack
data.desc: The user approaches the target disarmingly, then throws a sucker punch. This attack never misses.

data.name: Flatter
data.desc: Flattery is used to confuse the target. However, this also raises the target's Sp. Atk stat.

data.name: Fling
data.desc: The user flings its held item at the target to attack. This move's power and effects depend on the item.

data.name: Foul Play
data.desc: The user turns the target's power against it. The higher the target's Attack stat, the greater the move's power.

data.name: Hone Claws
data.desc: The user sharpens its claws to boost its Attack stat and accuracy.

data.name: Hyperspace Fury
data.desc: Using its many arms, the user unleashes a barrage of attacks that ignore the effects of moves like Protect and Detect. But the user's Defense stat falls.

data.name: Knock Off
data.desc: The user slaps down the target's held item, and that item can't be used in that battle. The move does more damage if the target has a held item.

data.name: Malicious Moonsault
data.desc: The user, Incineroar, strengthens its body using its Z-Power and crashes into the target with full force.

data.name: Memento
data.desc: The user faints when using this move. In return, this harshly lowers the target's Attack and Sp. Atk stats.

data.name: Nasty Plot
data.desc: The user stimulates its brain by thinking bad thoughts. This sharply raises the user's Sp. Atk stat.

data.name: Night Daze
data.desc: The user lets loose a pitch-black shock wave at its target. This may also lower the target's accuracy.

data.name: Night Slash
data.desc: The user slashes the target the instant an opportunity arises. Critical hits land more easily.

data.name: Parting Shot
data.desc: With a parting threat, the user lowers the target's Attack and Sp. Atk stats. Then it switches with a party Pokémon.

data.name: Payback
data.desc: The user stores power, then attacks. If the user moves after the target, this attack's power will be doubled.

data.name: Power Trip
data.desc: The user boasts its strength and attacks the target. The more the user's stats are raised, the greater the move's power.

data.name: Punishment
data.desc: The more the target has powered up with stat changes, the greater the move's power.

data.name: Pursuit
data.desc: The power of this attack move is doubled if it's used on a target that's switching out of battle.

data.name: Quash
data.desc: The user suppresses the target and makes its move go last.

data.name: Snarl
data.desc: The user yells as if it's ranting about something, which lowers the Sp. Atk stat of opposing Pokémon.

data.name: Snatch
data.desc: The user steals the effects of any attempts to use a healing or stat-changing move.

data.name: Sucker Punch
data.desc: This move enables the user to attack first. This move fails if the target is not readying an attack.

data.name: Switcheroo
data.desc: The user trades held items with the target faster than the eye can follow.

data.name: Taunt
data.desc: The target is taunted into a rage that allows it to use only attack moves for three turns.

data.name: Thief
data.desc: The user attacks and steals the target's held item simultaneously. The user can't steal anything if it already holds an item.

data.name: Throat Chop
data.desc: The user attacks the target's throat, and the resultant suffering prevents the target from using moves that emit sound for two turns.

data.name: Topsy-Turvy
data.desc: All stat changes affecting the target turn topsy-turvy and become the opposite of what they were.

data.name: Torment
data.desc: The user torments and enrages the target, making it incapable of using the same move twice in a row.

data.name: Clanging Scales
data.desc: The user rubs the scales on its entire body and makes a huge noise to attack the opposing Pokémon. The user's Defense stat goes down after the attack.

data.name: Clangorous Soulblaze
data.desc: After obtaining Z-Power, the user, Kommo-o, attacks the opposing PokÃ©mon with full force. This move boosts the user's stats.

data.name: Core Enforcer
data.desc: If the Pokémon the user has inflicted damage on have already used their moves, this move eliminates the effect of the target's Ability.

data.name: Devastating Drake
data.desc: The user materializes its aura using its Z-Power and attacks the target with full force. The power varies, depending on the original move.

data.name: Devastating Drake
data.desc: The user materializes its aura using its Z-Power and attacks the target with full force. The power varies, depending on the original move.

data.name: Draco Meteor
data.desc: Comets are summoned down from the sky onto the target. The attack's recoil harshly lowers the user's Sp. Atk stat.

data.name: Dragon Breath
data.desc: The user exhales a mighty gust that inflicts damage. This may also leave the target with paralysis.

data.name: Dragon Claw
data.desc: The user slashes the target with huge sharp claws.

data.name: Dragon Dance
data.desc: The user vigorously performs a mystic, powerful dance that raises its Attack and Speed stats.

data.name: Dragon Hammer
data.desc: The user uses its body like a hammer to attack the target and inflict damage.

data.name: Dragon Pulse
data.desc: The target is attacked with a shock wave generated by the user's gaping mouth.

data.name: Dragon Rage
data.desc: This attack hits the target with a shock wave of pure rage. This attack always inflicts 40 HP damage.

data.name: Dragon Rush
data.desc: The user tackles the target while exhibiting overwhelming menace. This may also make the target flinch.

data.name: Dragon Tail
data.desc: The target is knocked away, and a different Pokémon is dragged out. In the wild, this ends a battle against a single Pokémon.

data.name: Dual Chop
data.desc: The user attacks its target by hitting it with brutal strikes. The target is hit twice in a row.

data.name: Outrage
data.desc: The user rampages and attacks for two to three turns. The user then becomes confused.

data.name: Roar of Time
data.desc: The user blasts the target with power that distorts even time. The user can't move on the next turn.

data.name: Spacial Rend
data.desc: The user tears the target along with the space around it. Critical hits land more easily.

data.name: Twister
data.desc: The user whips up a vicious tornado to tear at the opposing Pokémon. This may also make them flinch.

data.name: 10,000,000 Volt Thunderbolt
data.desc: The user, Pikachu wearing a cap, powers up a jolt of electricity using its Z-Power and unleashes it. Critical hits land more easily.

data.name: Bolt Strike
data.desc: The user surrounds itself with a great amount of electricity and charges its target. This may also leave the target with paralysis.

data.name: Catastropika
data.desc: The user, Pikachu, surrounds itself with the maximum amount of electricity using its Z-Power and pounces on its target with full force.

data.name: Charge
data.desc: The user boosts the power of the Electric move it uses on the next turn. This also raises the user's Sp. Def stat.

data.name: Charge Beam
data.desc: The user attacks with an electric charge. The user may use any remaining electricity to raise its Sp. Atk stat.

data.name: Discharge
data.desc: The user strikes everything around it by letting loose a flare of electricity. This may also cause paralysis.

data.name: Eerie Impulse
data.desc: The user's body generates an eerie impulse. Exposing the target to it harshly lowers the target's Sp. Atk stat.

data.name: Electric Terrain
data.desc: The user electrifies the ground for five turns, powering up Electric-type moves. Pokémon on the ground no longer fall asleep.

data.name: Electrify
data.desc: If the target is electrified before it uses a move during that turn, the target's move becomes Electric type.

data.name: Electro Ball
data.desc: The user hurls an electric orb at the target. The faster the user is than the target, the greater the move's power.

data.name: Electroweb
data.desc: The user attacks and captures opposing Pokémon using an electric net. This lowers their Speed stat.

data.name: Fusion Bolt
data.desc: The user throws down a giant lightning bolt. This move's power is increased when influenced by an enormous flame.

data.name: Gigavolt Havoc
data.desc: The user hits the target with a powerful electric current collected by its Z-Power. The power varies, depending on the original move.

data.name: Gigavolt Havoc
data.desc: The user hits the target with a powerful electric current collected by its Z-Power. The power varies, depending on the original move.

data.name: Ion Deluge
data.desc: The user disperses electrically charged particles, which changes Normal-type moves to Electric-type moves.

data.name: Magnet Rise
data.desc: The user levitates using electrically generated magnetism for five turns.

data.name: Magnetic Flux
data.desc: The user manipulates magnetic fields, which raises the Defense and Sp. Def stats of ally Pokémon with the Plus or Minus Ability.

data.name: Nuzzle
data.desc: The user attacks by nuzzling its electrified cheeks against the target. This also leaves the target with paralysis.

data.name: Parabolic Charge
data.desc: The user attacks everything around it. The user's HP is restored by half the damage taken by those hit.

data.name: Plasma Fists
data.desc: The user attacks with electrically charged fists. This move changes Normal-type moves to Electric-type moves.

data.name: Shock Wave
data.desc: The user strikes the target with a quick jolt of electricity. This attack never misses.

data.name: Spark
data.desc: The user throws an electrically charged tackle at the target. This may also leave the target with paralysis.

data.name: Stoked Sparksurfer
data.desc: After obtaining Z-Power, the user, Alolan Raichu, attacks the target with full force. This move leaves the target with paralysis.

data.name: Thunder
data.desc: A wicked thunderbolt is dropped on the target to inflict damage. This may also leave the target with paralysis.

data.name: Thunder Fang
data.desc: The user bites with electrified fangs. This may also make the target flinch or leave it with paralysis.

data.name: Thunder Punch
data.desc: The target is punched with an electrified fist. This may also leave the target with paralysis.

data.name: Thunder Shock
data.desc: A jolt of electricity crashes down on the target to inflict damage. This may also leave the target with paralysis.

data.name: Thunder Wave
data.desc: The user launches a weak jolt of electricity that paralyzes the target.

data.name: Thunderbolt
data.desc: A strong electric blast crashes down on the target. This may also leave the target with paralysis.

data.name: Volt Switch
data.desc: After making its attack, the user rushes back to switch places with a party Pokémon in waiting.

data.name: Volt Tackle
data.desc: The user electrifies itself and charges the target. This also damages the user quite a lot. This attack may leave the target with paralysis.

data.name: Wild Charge
data.desc: The user shrouds itself in electricity and smashes into its target. This also damages the user a little.

data.name: Zap Cannon
data.desc: The user fires an electric blast like a cannon to inflict damage and cause paralysis.

data.name: Zing Zap
data.desc: A strong electric blast crashes down on the target, giving it an electric shock. This may also make the target flinch.

data.name: Aromatic Mist
data.desc: The user raises the Sp. Def stat of an ally Pokémon by using a mysterious aroma.

data.name: Baby-Doll Eyes
data.desc: The user stares at the target with its baby-doll eyes, which lowers its Attack stat. This move always goes first.

data.name: Charm
data.desc: The user gazes at the target rather charmingly, making it less wary. This harshly lowers its Attack stat.

data.name: Crafty Shield
data.desc: The user protects itself and its allies from status moves with a mysterious power. This does not stop moves that do damage.

data.name: Dazzling Gleam
data.desc: The user damages opposing Pokémon by emitting a powerful flash.

data.name: Disarming Voice
data.desc: Letting out a charming cry, the user does emotional damage to opposing Pokémon. This attack never misses.

data.name: Draining Kiss
data.desc: The user steals the target's HP with a kiss. The user's HP is restored by over half of the damage taken by the target.

data.name: Fairy Lock
data.desc: By locking down the battlefield, the user keeps all Pokémon from fleeing during the next turn.

data.name: Fairy Wind
data.desc: The user stirs up a fairy wind and strikes the target with it.

data.name: Fleur Cannon
data.desc: The user unleashes a strong beam. The attack's recoil harshly lowers the user's Sp. Atk stat.

data.name: Floral Healing
data.desc: The user restores the target's HP by up to half of its max HP. It restores more HP when the terrain is grass.

data.name: Flower Shield
data.desc: The user raises the Defense stat of all Grass-type Pokémon in battle with a mysterious power.

data.name: Geomancy

data.name: Guardian of Alola

data.name: Let's Snuggle Forever
data.desc: After obtaining Z-Power, the user, Mimikyu, punches the target with full force.

data.name: Light of Ruin
data.desc: Drawing power from the Eternal Flower, the user fires a powerful beam of light. This also damages the user quite a lot.

data.name: Misty Terrain
data.desc: This protects Pokémon on the ground from status conditions and halves damage from Dragon-type moves for five turns.

data.name: Moonblast
data.desc: Borrowing the power of the moon, the user attacks the target. This may also lower the target's Sp. Atk stat.

data.name: Moonlight
data.desc: The user restores its own HP. The amount of HP regained varies with the weather.

data.name: Nature's Madness
data.desc: The user hits the target with the force of nature. It halves the target's HP.

data.name: Play Rough
data.desc: The user plays rough with the target and attacks it. This may also lower the target's Attack stat.

data.name: Sweet Kiss
data.desc: The user kisses the target with a sweet, angelic cuteness that causes confusion.

data.name: Twinkle Tackle
data.desc: The user creates a very charming space using its Z-Power and totally toys with the target. The power varies, depending on the original move.

data.name: All-Out Pummeling
data.desc: The user rams an energy orb created by its Z-Power into the target with full force. The power varies, depending on the original move.

data.name: Arm Thrust
data.desc: The user lets loose a flurry of open-palmed arm thrusts that hit two to five times in a row.

data.name: Aura Sphere
data.desc: The user lets loose a blast of aura power from deep within its body at the target. This attack never misses.

data.name: Brick Break
data.desc: The user attacks with a swift chop. It can also break barriers, such as Light Screen and Reflect.

data.name: Bulk Up
data.desc: The user tenses its muscles to bulk up its body, raising both its Attack and Defense stats.

data.name: Circle Throw
data.desc: The target is thrown, and a different Pokémon is dragged out. In the wild, this ends a battle against a single Pokémon.

data.name: Close Combat
data.desc: The user fights the target up close without guarding itself. This also lowers the user's Defense and Sp. Def stats.

data.name: Counter
data.desc: A retaliation move that counters any physical attack, inflicting double the damage taken.

data.name: Cross Chop
data.desc: The user delivers a double chop with its forearms crossed. Critical hits land more easily.

data.name: Detect
data.desc: Enables the user to evade all attacks. Its chance of failing rises if it is used in succession.

data.name: Double Kick
data.desc: The target is quickly kicked twice in succession using both feet.

data.name: Drain Punch
data.desc: An energy-draining punch. The user's HP is restored by half the damage taken by the target.

data.name: Dynamic Punch
data.desc: The user punches the target with full, concentrated power. This confuses the target if it hits.

data.name: Final Gambit
data.desc: The user risks everything to attack its target. The user faints but does damage equal to its HP.

data.name: Flying Press
data.desc: The user dives down onto the target from the sky. This move is Fighting and Flying type simultaneously.

data.name: Focus Blast
data.desc: The user heightens its mental focus and unleashes its power. This may also lower the target's Sp. Def stat.

data.name: Focus Punch
data.desc: The user focuses its mind before launching a punch. This move fails if the user is hit before it is used.

data.name: Force Palm
data.desc: The target is attacked with a shock wave. This may also leave the target with paralysis.

data.name: Hammer Arm
data.desc: The user swings and hits with its strong, heavy fist. It lowers the user's Speed, however.

data.name: High Jump Kick
data.desc: The target is attacked with a knee kick from a jump. If it misses, the user is hurt instead.

data.name: Jump Kick
data.desc: The user jumps up high, then strikes with a kick. If the kick misses, the user hurts itself.

data.name: Karate Chop
data.desc: The target is attacked with a sharp chop. Critical hits land more easily.

data.name: Low Kick
data.desc: A powerful low kick that makes the target fall over. The heavier the target, the greater the move's power.

data.name: Low Sweep
data.desc: The user makes a swift attack on the target's legs, which lowers the target's Speed stat.

data.name: Mach Punch
data.desc: The user throws a punch at blinding speed. This move always goes first.

data.name: Mat Block
data.desc: Using a pulled-up mat as a shield, the user protects itself and its allies from damaging moves. This does not stop status moves.

data.name: Power-Up Punch
data.desc: Striking opponents over and over makes the user's fists harder. Hitting a target raises the Attack stat.

data.name: Quick Guard
data.desc: The user protects itself and its allies from priority moves.

data.name: Revenge
data.desc: This attack move's power is doubled if the user has been hurt by the opponent in the same turn.

data.name: Reversal
data.desc: An all-out attack that becomes more powerful the less HP the user has.

data.name: Rock Smash
data.desc: The user attacks with a punch. This may also lower the target's Defense stat.

data.name: Rolling Kick
data.desc: The user lashes out with a quick, spinning kick. This may also make the target flinch.

data.name: Sacred Sword
data.desc: The user attacks by slicing with a long horn. The target's stat changes don't affect this attack's damage.

data.name: Secret Sword
data.desc: The user cuts with its long horn. The odd power contained in the horn does physical damage to the target.

data.name: Seismic Toss
data.desc: The target is thrown using the power of gravity. It inflicts damage equal to the user's level.

data.name: Sky Uppercut
data.desc: The user attacks the target with an uppercut thrown skyward with force.

data.name: Storm Throw
data.desc: The user strikes the target with a fierce blow. This attack always results in a critical hit.

data.name: Submission
data.desc: The user grabs the target and recklessly dives for the ground. This also damages the user a little.

data.name: Superpower

data.name: Triple Kick

data.name: Vital Throw

data.name: Blast Burn

data.name: Ember

data.name: Fire Lash

data.name: Heat Crash
data.desc: The user slams its target with its flame-covered body. The more the user outweighs the target, the greater the move's power.

data.name: Heat Wave

data.name: Incinerate
data.desc: The user attacks opposing Pokémon with fire. If a Pokémon is holding a certain item, such as a Berry, the item becomes burned up and unusable.

data.name: Inferno
data.desc: The user attacks by engulfing the target in an intense fire. This leaves the target with a burn.

data.name: Inferno Overdrive
data.desc: The user breathes a stream of intense fire toward the target with the full force of its Z-Power. The power varies depending on the original move.

data.name: Inferno Overdrive
data.desc: The user breathes a stream of intense fire toward the target with the full force of its Z-Power. The power varies depending on the original move.

data.name: Lava Plume
data.desc: The user torches everything around it in an inferno of scarlet flames. This may also leave those it hits with a burn.

data.name: Magma Storm
data.desc: The target becomes trapped within a maelstrom of fire that rages for four to five turns.

data.name: Mind Blown
data.desc: The user attacks everything around it by causing its own head to explode. This also damages the user.

data.name: Mystical Fire
data.desc: The user attacks by breathing a special, hot fire. This also lowers the target's Sp. Atk stat.

data.name: Overheat
data.desc: The user attacks the target at full power. The attack's recoil harshly lowers the user's Sp. Atk stat.

data.name: Sacred Fire
data.desc: The target is razed with a mystical fire of great intensity. This may also leave the target with a burn.

data.name: Searing Shot
data.desc: The user torches everything around it in an inferno of scarlet flames. This may also leave those it hits with a burn.

data.name: Shell Trap
data.desc: The user sets a shell trap. If the user is hit by a physical move, the trap will explode and inflict damage on the opposing Pokémon.

data.name: Sunny Day
data.desc: The user intensifies the sun for five turns, powering up Fire-type moves. It lowers the power of Water-type moves.

data.name: V-create
data.desc: With a hot flame on its forehead, the user hurls itself at its target. This lowers the user's Defense, Sp. Def, and Speed stats.

data.name: Will-O-Wisp
data.desc: The user shoots a sinister, bluish-white flame at the target to inflict a burn.

data.name: Astonish
data.desc: The user attacks the target while shouting in a startling fashion. This may also make the target flinch.

data.name: Confuse Ray
data.desc: The target is exposed to a sinister ray that triggers confusion.

data.name: Curse
data.desc: A move that works differently for the Ghost type than for all other types.

data.name: Destiny Bond
data.desc: After using this move, if the user faints, the Pokémon that landed the knockout hit also faints. Its chance of failing rises if it is used in succession.

data.name: Grudge
data.desc: If the user faints, the user's grudge fully depletes the PP of the opponent's move that knocked it out.

data.name: Hex
data.desc: This relentless attack does massive damage to a target affected by status conditions.

data.name: Lick
data.desc: The target is licked with a long tongue, causing damage. This may also leave the target with paralysis.

data.name: Menacing Moonraze Maelstrom
data.desc: After obtaining Z-Power, the user, Lunala, attacks the target with full force. This move can ignore the effect of the target's Ability.

data.name: Moongeist Beam
data.desc: The user emits a sinister ray to attack the target. This move can be used on the target regardless of its Abilities.

data.name: Never-Ending Nightmare
data.desc: Deep-seated grudges summoned by the user's Z-Power trap the target. The power varies, depending on the original move.

data.name: Never-Ending Nightmare
data.desc: Deep-seated grudges summoned by the user's Z-Power trap the target. The power varies, depending on the original move.

data.name: Night Shade
data.desc: The user makes the target see a frightening mirage. It inflicts damage equal to the user's level.

data.name: Nightmare
data.desc: A sleeping target sees a nightmare that inflicts some damage every turn.

data.name: Ominous Wind
data.desc: The user blasts the target with a gust of repulsive wind. This may also raise all the user's stats at once.

data.name: Phantom Force
data.desc: The user vanishes somewhere, then strikes the target on the next turn. This move hits even if the target protects itself.

data.name: Shadow Ball
data.desc: The user hurls a shadowy blob at the target. This may also lower the target's Sp. Def stat.

data.name: Shadow Bone
data.desc: The user attacks by beating the target with a bone that contains a spirit. This may also lower the target's Defense stat.

data.name: Shadow Claw
data.desc: The user slashes with a sharp claw made from shadows. Critical hits land more easily.

data.name: Shadow Force
data.desc: The user disappears, then strikes the target on the next turn. This move hits even if the target protects itself.

data.name: Shadow Punch
data.desc: The user throws a punch from the shadows. This attack never misses.

data.name: Shadow Sneak
data.desc: The user extends its shadow and attacks the target from behind. This move always goes first.

data.name: Sinister Arrow Raid
data.desc: The user, Decidueye, creates countless arrows using its Z-Power and shoots the target with full force.

data.desc: After obtaining Z-Power, the user, Marshadow, punches and kicks the target consecutively with full force.

data.name: Spectral Thief
data.desc: The user hides in the target's shadow, steals the target's stat boosts, and then attacks.

data.name: Spirit Shackle
data.desc: The user attacks while simultaneously stitching the target's shadow to the ground to prevent the target from escaping.

data.name: Spite
data.desc: The user unleashes its grudge on the move last used by the target by cutting 4 PP from it.

data.name: Trick-or-Treat
data.desc: The user takes the target trick-or-treating. This adds Ghost type to the target's type.

data.name: Absorb
data.desc: A nutrient-draining attack. The user's HP is restored by half the damage taken by the target.

data.name: Aromatherapy
data.desc: The user releases a soothing scent that heals all status conditions affecting the user's party.

data.name: Bloom Doom
data.desc: The user collects energy from plants using its Z-Power and attacks the target with full force. The power varies, depending on the original move.

data.name: Bloom Doom
data.desc: The user collects energy from plants using its Z-Power and attacks the target with full force. The power varies, depending on the original move.

data.name: Bullet Seed
data.desc: The user forcefully shoots seeds at the target two to five times in a row.

data.name: Cotton Guard
data.desc: The user protects itself by wrapping its body in soft cotton, which drastically raises the user's Defense stat.

data.name: Cotton Spore
data.desc: The user releases cotton-like spores that cling to the opposing Pokémon, which harshly lowers their Speed stat.

data.name: Energy Ball
data.desc: The user draws power from nature and fires it at the target. This may also lower the target's Sp. Def stat.

data.name: Frenzy Plant

data.name: Giga Drain
data.desc: A nutrient-draining attack. The user's HP is restored by half the damage taken by the target.

data.name: Grass Knot

data.name: Grass Pledge
data.desc: A column of grass hits the target. When used with its water equivalent, its power increases and a vast swamp appears.

data.name: Grass Whistle

data.name: Grassy Terrain
data.desc: The user turns the ground to grass for five turns. This restores the HP of Pokémon on the ground a little every turn and powers up Grass type-moves.

data.name: Horn Leech
data.desc: The user drains the target's energy with its horns. The user's HP is restored by half the damage taken by the target.

data.name: Ingrain
data.desc: The user lays roots that restore its HP on every turn. Because it's rooted, it can't switch out.

data.name: Leaf Blade
data.desc: The user handles a sharp leaf like a sword and attacks by cutting its target. Critical hits land more easily.

data.name: Leaf Storm
data.desc: The user whips up a storm of leaves around the target. The attack's recoil harshly lowers the user's Sp. Atk stat.

data.name: Leaf Tornado
data.desc: The user attacks its target by encircling it in sharp leaves. This attack may also lower the target's accuracy.

data.name: Leafage

data.name: Leech Seed
data.desc: A seed is planted on the target. It steals some HP from the target every turn.

data.name: Magical Leaf
data.desc: The user scatters curious leaves that chase the target. This attack never misses.

data.name: Mega Drain
data.desc: A nutrient-draining attack. The user's HP is restored by half the damage taken by the target.

data.name: Needle Arm
data.desc: The user attacks by wildly swinging its thorny arms. This may also make the target flinch.

data.name: Petal Blizzard
data.desc: The user stirs up a violent petal blizzard and attacks everything around it.

data.name: Petal Dance
data.desc: The user attacks the target by scattering petals for two to three turns. The user then becomes confused.

data.name: Power Whip
data.desc: The user violently whirls its vines, tentacles, or the like to harshly lash the target.

data.name: Razor Leaf
data.desc: Sharp-edged leaves are launched to slash at the opposing Pokémon. Critical hits land more easily.

data.name: Seed Bomb
data.desc: The user slams a barrage of hard-shelled seeds down on the target from above.

data.name: Seed Flare

data.name: Sleep Powder
data.desc: The user scatters a big cloud of sleep-inducing dust around the target.

data.name: Solar Beam
data.desc: In this two-turn attack, the user gathers light, then blasts a bundled beam on the next turn.

data.name: Solar Blade
data.desc: In this two-turn attack, the user gathers light and fills a blade with the light's energy, attacking the target on the next turn.

data.name: Spiky Shield
data.desc: In addition to protecting the user from attacks, this move also damages any attacker who makes direct contact.

data.name: Spore
data.desc: The user scatters bursts of spores that induce sleep.

data.name: Strength Sap
data.desc: The user restores its HP by the same amount as the target's Attack stat. It also lowers the target's Attack stat.

data.name: Stun Spore

data.name: Synthesis
data.desc: The user restores its own HP. The amount of HP regained varies with the weather.

data.name: Trop Kick
data.desc: The user lands an intense kick of tropical origins on the target. This also lowers the target's Attack stat.

data.name: Vine Whip

data.name: Worry Seed

data.name: Bone Club
data.desc: The user clubs the target with a bone. This may also make the target flinch.

data.name: Bone Rush
data.desc: The user strikes the target with a hard bone two to five times in a row.

data.name: Bonemerang
data.desc: The user throws the bone it holds. The bone loops around to hit the target twiceâ€”coming and going.

data.name: Bulldoze
data.desc: The user strikes everything around it by stomping down on the ground. This lowers the Speed stat of those hit.

data.name: Dig
data.desc: The user burrows, then attacks on the next turn.

data.name: Drill Run
data.desc: The user crashes into its target while rotating its body like a drill. Critical hits land more easily.

data.name: Earth Power

data.name: Earthquake

data.name: Fissure
data.desc: The user opens up a fissure in the ground and drops the target in. The target faints instantly if this attack hits.

data.name: High Horsepower
data.desc: The user fiercely attacks the target using its entire body.

data.name: Land's Wrath
data.desc: The user gathers the energy of the land and focuses that power on opposing Pokémon to damage them.

data.name: Magnitude
data.desc: The user attacks everything around it with a ground-shaking quake. Its power varies.

data.name: Mud Bomb
data.desc: The user launches a hard-packed mud ball to attack. This may also lower the target's accuracy.

data.name: Mud Shot
data.desc: The user attacks by hurling a blob of mud at the target. This also lowers the target's Speed stat.

data.name: Mud Sport
data.desc: The user kicks up mud on the battlefield. This weakens Electric-type moves for five turns.

data.name: Mud-Slap
data.desc: The user hurls mud in the target's face to inflict damage and lower its accuracy.

data.name: Precipice Blades
data.desc: The user attacks opposing Pokémon by manifesting the power of the land in fearsome blades of stone.

data.desc: Tilling the soil, the user makes it easier for plants to grow. This raises the Attack and Sp. Atk stats of Grass-type Pokémon.

data.name: Sand Attack
data.desc: Sand is hurled in the target's face, reducing the target's accuracy.

data.name: Sand Tomb
data.desc: The user traps the target inside a harshly raging sandstorm for four to five turns.

data.name: Shore Up
data.desc: The user regains up to half of its max HP. It restores more HP in a sandstorm.

data.name: Spikes
data.desc: The user lays a trap of spikes at the opposing team's feet. The trap hurts Pokémon that switch into battle.

data.name: Stomping Tantrum
data.desc: Driven by frustration, the user attacks the target. If the user's previous move has failed, the power of this move doubles.

data.name: Tectonic Rage
data.desc: The user burrows deep into the ground and slams into the target with the full force of its Z-Power. The power varies, depending on the original move.

data.name: Tectonic Rage
data.desc: The user burrows deep into the ground and slams into the target with the full force of its Z-Power. The power varies, depending on the original move.

data.name: Thousand Arrows
data.desc: This move also hits opposing Pokémon that are in the air. Those Pokémon are knocked down to the ground.

data.name: Thousand Waves
data.desc: The user attacks with a wave that crawls along the ground. Those hit can't flee from battle.

data.name: Aurora Beam
data.desc: The target is hit with a rainbow-colored beam. This may also lower the target's Attack stat.

data.name: Aurora Veil
data.desc: This move reduces damage from physical and special moves for five turns. This can be used only in a hailstorm.

data.name: Avalanche
data.desc: The power of this attack move is doubled if the user has been hurt by the target in the same turn.

data.name: Blizzard
data.desc: A howling blizzard is summoned to strike opposing Pokémon. This may also leave the opposing Pokémon frozen.

data.name: Freeze Shock
data.desc: On the second turn, the user hits the target with electrically charged ice. This may also leave the target with paralysis.

data.name: Freeze-Dry

data.name: Frost Breath
data.desc: The user blows its cold breath on the target. This attack always results in a critical hit.

data.name: Glaciate
data.desc: The user attacks by blowing freezing cold air at opposing Pokémon. This lowers their Speed stat.

data.name: Hail
data.desc: The user summons a hailstorm lasting five turns. It damages all Pokémon except the Ice type.

data.name: Haze

data.name: Ice Ball
data.desc: The user attacks the target for five turns. The move's power increases each time it hits.

data.name: Ice Beam
data.desc: The target is struck with an icy-cold beam of energy. This may also leave the target frozen.

data.name: Ice Burn
data.desc: On the second turn, an ultracold, freezing wind surrounds the target. This may leave the target with a burn.

data.name: Ice Fang
data.desc: The user bites with cold-infused fangs. This may also make the target flinch or leave it frozen.

data.name: Ice Hammer
data.desc: The user swings and hits with its strong, heavy fist. It lowers the user's Speed, however.

data.name: Ice Punch
data.desc: The target is punched with an icy fist. This may also leave the target frozen.

data.name: Ice Shard
data.desc: The user flash-freezes chunks of ice and hurls them at the target. This move always goes first.

data.name: Icicle Crash
data.desc: The user attacks by harshly dropping large icicles onto the target. This may also make the target flinch.

data.name: Icicle Spear

data.name: Icy Wind
data.desc: The user attacks with a gust of chilled air. This also lowers the opposing Pokémon's Speed stats.

data.name: Mist

data.name: Powder Snow
data.desc: The user attacks with a chilling gust of powdery snow. This may also freeze the opposing Pokémon.

data.name: Sheer Cold
data.desc: The target faints instantly. It's less likely to hit the target if it's used by Pokémon other than Ice types.

data.name: Subzero Slammer

data.name: Attract

data.name: Barrage

data.name: Baton Pass

data.name: Bestow

data.name: Bide
data.desc: The user endures attacks for two turns, then strikes back to cause double the damage taken.

data.name: Bind
data.desc: Things such as long bodies or tentacles are used to bind and squeeze the target for four to five turns.

data.name: Block
data.desc: The user blocks the target's way with arms spread wide to prevent escape.

data.desc: The user attacks everything around it with the destructive power of a terrible, explosive sound.

data.name: Breakneck Blitz
data.desc: The user builds up its momentum using its Z-Power and crashes into the target at full speed. The power varies, depending on the original move.

data.name: Breakneck Blitz
data.desc: The user builds up its momentum using its Z-Power and crashes into the target at full speed. The power varies, depending on the original move.

data.name: Camouflage
data.desc: The user's type is changed depending on its environment, such as at water's edge, in grass, or in a cave.

data.name: Captivate
data.desc: If any opposing Pokémon is the opposite gender of the user, it is charmed, which harshly lowers its Sp. Atk stat.

data.name: Celebrate
data.desc: The Pokémon congratulates you on your special day!

data.name: Chip Away
data.desc: Looking for an opening, the user strikes consistently. The target's stat changes don't affect this attack's damage.

data.name: Comet Punch
data.desc: The target is hit with a flurry of punches that strike two to five times in a row.

data.name: Confide

data.name: Constrict
data.desc: The target is attacked with long, creeping tentacles, vines, or the like. This may also lower the target's Speed stat.

data.name: Conversion

data.name: Conversion 2
data.desc: The user changes its type to make itself resistant to the type of the attack the opponent used last.

data.name: Copycat
data.desc: The user mimics the move used immediately before it. The move fails if no other move has been used yet.

data.name: Covet
data.desc: The user endearingly approaches the target, then steals the target's held item.

data.name: Crush Claw
data.desc: The user slashes the target with hard and sharp claws. This may also lower the target's Defense stat.

data.name: Crush Grip
data.desc: The target is crushed with great force. The more HP the target has left, the greater this move's power.

data.name: Cut
data.desc: The target is cut with a scythe or claw.

data.name: Defense Curl
data.desc: The user curls up to conceal weak spots and raise its Defense stat.

data.name: Disable
data.desc: For four turns, this move prevents the target from using the move it last used.

data.name: Dizzy Punch
data.desc: The target is hit with rhythmically launched punches. This may also leave the target confused.

data.name: Double Slap

data.name: Double Team

data.name: Double-Edge
data.desc: A reckless, life-risking tackle. This also damages the user quite a lot.

data.name: Echoed Voice
data.desc: The user attacks the target with an echoing voice. If this move is used every turn, its power is increased.

data.name: Egg Bomb
data.desc: A large egg is hurled at the target with maximum force to inflict damage.

data.name: Encore
data.desc: The user compels the target to keep using the move it encored for three turns.

data.name: Endeavor
data.desc: This attack move cuts down the target's HP to equal the user's HP.

data.name: Endure
data.desc: The user endures any attack with at least 1 HP. Its chance of failing rises if it is used in succession.

data.name: Entrainment
data.desc: The user dances with an odd rhythm that compels the target to mimic it, making the target's Ability the same as the user's.

data.name: Facade

data.name: Fake Out

data.name: Feint

data.name: Flail

data.name: Flash

data.name: Focus Energy
data.desc: The user takes a deep breath and focuses so that critical hits land more easily.

data.name: Follow Me

data.name: Foresight
data.desc: Enables a Ghost-type target to be hit by Normal- and Fighting-type attacks. This also enables an evasive target to be hit.

data.name: Frustration
data.desc: This full-power attack grows more powerful the less the user likes its Trainer.

data.name: Fury Attack
data.desc: The target is jabbed repeatedly with a horn or beak two to five times in a row.

data.name: Fury Swipes

data.name: Giga Impact

data.name: Glare
data.desc: The user intimidates the target with the pattern on its belly to cause paralysis.

data.name: Growl
data.desc: The user growls in an endearing way, making opposing Pokémon less wary. This lowers their Attack stat.

data.name: Growth
data.desc: The user's body grows all at once, raising the Attack and Sp. Atk stats.

data.name: Guillotine
data.desc: A vicious, tearing attack with big pincers. The target faints instantly if this attack hits.

data.name: Happy Hour
data.desc: Using Happy Hour doubles the amount of prize money received after battle.

data.name: Harden
data.desc: The user stiffens all the muscles in its body to raise its Defense stat.

data.name: Head Charge
data.desc: The user charges its head into its target, using its powerful guard hair. This also damages the user a little.

data.name: Headbutt
data.desc: The user sticks out its head and attacks by charging straight into the target. This may also make the target flinch.

data.name: Heal Bell

data.name: Helping Hand

data.name: Hidden Power

data.name: Hold Back
data.desc: The user holds back when it attacks, and the target is left with at least 1 HP.

data.name: Hold Hands

data.name: Horn Attack
data.desc: The target is jabbed with a sharply pointed horn to inflict damage.

data.name: Horn Drill
data.desc: The user stabs the target with a horn that rotates like a drill. The target faints instantly if this attack hits.

data.name: Howl
data.desc: The user howls loudly to raise its spirit, which raises its Attack stat.

data.name: Hyper Beam
data.desc: The target is attacked with a powerful beam. The user can't move on the next turn.

data.name: Hyper Fang
data.desc: The user bites hard on the target with its sharp front fangs. This may also make the target flinch.

data.name: Hyper Voice

data.name: Judgment

data.name: Laser Focus

data.name: Last Resort

data.name: Leer

data.name: Lovely Kiss

data.name: Lucky Chant

data.name: Me First

data.name: Mean Look

data.name: Mega Kick
data.desc: The target is attacked by a kick launched with muscle-packed power.

data.name: Mega Punch

data.name: Metronome

data.name: Milk Drink

data.name: Mind Reader

data.name: Minimize

data.name: Morning Sun
data.desc: The user restores its own HP. The amount of HP regained varies with the weather.

data.name: Multi-Attack

data.name: Natural Gift
data.desc: The user draws power to attack by using its held Berry. The Berry determines the move's type and power.

data.name: Nature Power

data.desc: The user attacks by swinging its tail as if it were a vicious wave in a raging storm.

data.name: Brine
data.desc: If the target's HP is half or less, this attack will hit with double the power.

data.name: Bubble
data.desc: A spray of countless bubbles is jetted at the opposing Pokémon. This may also lower their Speed stat.

data.name: Bubble Beam
data.desc: A spray of bubbles is forcefully ejected at the target. This may also lower its Speed stat.

data.name: Clamp
data.desc: The target is clamped and squeezed by the user's very thick and sturdy shell for four to five turns.

data.name: Crabhammer
data.desc: The target is hammered with a large pincer. Critical hits land more easily.

data.name: Dive
data.desc: Diving on the first turn, the user floats up and attacks on the next turn.

data.name: Hydro Cannon
data.desc: The target is hit with a watery blast. The user can't move on the next turn.

data.name: Hydro Pump
data.desc: The target is blasted by a huge volume of water launched under great pressure.

data.name: Hydro Vortex
data.desc: The user creates a huge whirling current using its Z-Power to swallow the target with full force. The power varies, depending on the original move.

data.name: Hydro Vortex
data.desc: The user creates a huge whirling current using its Z-Power to swallow the target with full force. The power varies, depending on the original move.

data.name: Liquidation
data.desc: The user slams into the target using a full-force blast of water. This may also lower the target's Defense stat.

data.name: Muddy Water
data.desc: The user attacks by shooting muddy water at the opposing Pokémon. This may also lower their accuracy.

data.name: Oceanic Operetta
data.desc: The user, Primarina, summons a massive amount of water using its Z-Power and attacks the target with full force.

data.name: Octazooka
data.desc: The user attacks by spraying ink in the target's face or eyes. This may also lower the target's accuracy.

data.name: Origin Pulse
data.desc: The user attacks opposing Pokémon with countless beams of light that glow a deep and brilliant blue.

data.name: Rain Dance
data.desc: The user summons a heavy rain that falls for five turns, powering up Water-type moves. It lowers the power of Fire-type moves.

data.name: Razor Shell
data.desc: The user cuts its target with sharp shells. This may also lower the target's Defense stat.

data.name: Scald
data.desc: The user shoots boiling hot water at its target. This may also leave the target with a burn.

data.name: Soak
data.desc: The user shoots a torrent of water at the target and changes the target's type to Water.

data.name: Sparkling Aria
data.desc: The user bursts into song, emitting many bubbles. Any Pokémon suffering from a burn will be healed by the touch of these bubbles.

data.name: Steam Eruption
data.desc: The user immerses the target in superheated steam. This may also leave the target with a burn.

data.name: Surf
data.desc: The user attacks everything around it by swamping its surroundings with a giant wave.

data.name: Water Gun
data.desc: The target is blasted with a forceful shot of water.

data.name: Water Pledge
data.desc: A column of water strikes the target. When combined with its fire equivalent, its power increases and a rainbow appears.

data.name: Water Pulse
data.desc: The user attacks the target with a pulsing blast of water. This may also confuse the target.

data.name: Water Shuriken
data.desc: The user hits the target with throwing stars two to five times in a row. This move always goes first.

data.name: Water Sport
data.desc: The user soaks the battlefield with water. This weakens Fire-type moves for five turns.

data.name: Water Spout
data.desc: The user spouts water to damage opposing Pokémon. The lower the user's HP, the lower the move's power.

data.name: Waterfall
data.desc: The user charges at the target and may make it flinch.

data.name: Whirlpool
data.desc: The user traps the target in a violent swirling whirlpool for four to five turns.

data.name: Withdraw
data.desc: The user withdraws its body into its hard shell, raising its Defense stat.

data.name: Acrobatics
data.desc: The user nimbly strikes the target. If the user is not holding an item, this attack inflicts massive damage.

data.name: Aerial Ace
data.desc: The user confounds the target with speed, then slashes. This attack never misses.

data.name: Aeroblast
data.desc: A vortex of air is shot at the target to inflict damage. Critical hits land more easily.

data.name: Air Cutter
data.desc: The user launches razor-like wind to slash the opposing Pokémon. Critical hits land more easily.

data.name: Air Slash
data.desc: The user attacks with a blade of air that slices even the sky. This may also make the target flinch.

data.name: Beak Blast
data.desc: The user first heats up its beak, and then it attacks the target. Making direct contact with the Pokémon while it's heating up its beak results in a burn.

data.name: Bounce
data.desc: The user bounces up high, then drops on the target on the second turn. This may also leave the target with paralysis.

data.name: Brave Bird
data.desc: The user tucks in its wings and charges from a low altitude. This also damages the user quite a lot.

data.name: Chatter
data.desc: The user attacks the target with sound waves of deafening chatter. This confuses the target.

data.name: Defog
data.desc: A strong wind blows away the target's barriers such as Reflect or Light Screen. This also lowers the target's evasiveness.

data.name: Dragon Ascent
data.desc: After soaring upward, the user attacks its target by dropping out of the sky at high speeds. But it lowers its own Defense and Sp. Def stats in the process.

data.name: Drill Peck
data.desc: A corkscrewing attack with a sharp beak acting as a drill.

data.name: Feather Dance
data.desc: The user covers the target's body with a mass of down that harshly lowers its Attack stat.

data.name: Fly
data.desc: The user soars and then strikes its target on the next turn.

data.name: Gust
data.desc: A gust of wind is whipped up by wings and launched at the target to inflict damage.

data.name: Hurricane
data.desc: The user attacks by wrapping its opponent in a fierce wind that flies up into the sky. This may also confuse the target.

data.name: Mirror Move
data.desc: The user counters the target by mimicking the target's last move.

data.name: Oblivion Wing
data.desc: The user absorbs its target's HP. The user's HP is restored by over half of the damage taken by the target.

data.name: Peck
data.desc: The target is jabbed with a sharply pointed beak or horn.

data.name: Pluck
data.desc: The user pecks the target. If the target is holding a Berry, the user eats it and gains its effect.

data.name: Roost
data.desc: The user lands and rests its body. It restores the user's HP by up to half of its max HP.

data.name: Sky Attack
data.desc: A second-turn attack move where critical hits land more easily. This may also make the target flinch.

data.name: Sky Drop
data.desc: The user takes the target into the sky, then drops it during the next turn. The target cannot attack while in the sky.

data.name: Supersonic Skystrike
data.desc: The user soars up with its Z-Power and plummets toward the target at full speed. The power varies, depending on the original move.

data.name: Supersonic Skystrike
data.desc: The user soars up with its Z-Power and plummets toward the target at full speed. The power varies, depending on the original move.

data.name: Tailwind
data.desc: The user whips up a turbulent whirlwind that ups the Speed stat of the user and its allies for four turns.

data.name: Wing Attack
data.desc: The target is struck with large, imposing wings spread wide to inflict damage.
